page.title: 03Bramhope: Transport
page.content: Of 132 Bramhope families sampled, 1 had no car, 63 had one car, 64 had two cars and 4 had three cars.Major roads,the A660(T)-Leeds-Wharfedale via Otley,off peak 500-520 vehicles/ hr. in both directions and A658 (Bradford-Harrogate)intersect just within the D-Block. Public transport provision includes one service on Tuesday of each week serving Bramhope village itself.5 services operate on the A660(T) offering 4 journeys/hour/direction connecting Leeds with Otley,Ilkley and Skipton.The Leeds-Harrogate railway line passes beneath the D-Block via the Bramhope Tunnel.1km to the west of the D-Block is the Leeds-Bradford Airport.It has Category'B'status linking the region to other British Airports,Continental gateway airports, the,Channel Is. and the Mediterranean.
